SEARCH
Module ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2
Package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint

Class PaintProperties

java.lang.Object
ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.PaintProperties
public class PaintProperties extends Object
This class represents the properties of a shape, providing the model for attributes such as fill color, border color, border width, and stroke thickness.

Instances of this class are used to define the visual appearance of shapes in the paint application, including whether the shape is filled, its fill color, stroke color, stroke thickness, and the number of vertices (used for shapes like polygons).

    • PaintProperties

      public PaintProperties(Boolean filled, javafx.scene.paint.Color fillColor, javafx.scene.paint.Color strokeColor, double strokeThickness, int vertices)
      Constructor to initialize the paint properties for a shape.
      Parameters:
      filled - Indicates whether the shape is filled.
      fillColor - The color used to fill the shape.
      strokeColor - The color of the shape's border.
      strokeThickness - The thickness of the shape's border.
      vertices - The number of vertices for polygon shapes.
